channel.title: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
channel.description:

| 3016,3456,104,104 0,3067,3506 0 0 1 765,553 1 2 2 1 0 0 1796 0 0 hA uwxMwnlA/d5W6EgYWx java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Since i sometimes got an black screen this is what it will do when you try to login again.
When i delete character data it will login again but, it will not if i don't.
Can you help me out?
Mvg
Danny

item.title: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:

Class291.run:323 java.lang.Thread.r a.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero | 3016,3456,104,104 0,3067,3506 0 0 1 765,553 1 2 2 1 0 0 1796 0 0 hA uwxMwnlA/d5W6EgYWx
Should start by looking into what's causing this divide by -0 error.
